tool_description: Segments players into distinct groups based on behavior patterns, engagement levels, spending habits, and other configurable criteria using clustering and rule-based approaches.

segmentation_method.description: Segmentation approach: kmeans, hierarchical, rule_based, or hybrid

feature_weights.description: Weights for different features in segmentation

error_messages: Empty player metrics: At least one player metrics record required for segmentation.
Invalid segmentation method: Must be one of [kmeans, hierarchical, rule_based, hybrid].
Invalid number of segments: Must be between 2 and 20.
Feature weights mismatch: Number of weights must match number of features in player metrics.
Insufficient data diversity: Player data lacks sufficient variation for meaningful segmentation.
usage: Provide player_metrics from other analytics tools, specify segmentation_method, and optionally set number_of_segments and feature_weights. Returns player segments with characteristics and assignments.

segment_sizes.description: Number of players in each segment
